Text: This is Celebrity Apprentice, not The Apprentice. Could a mod rename it to save everyone downloading this garbage oh and including USA on the end might be useful as it isn't the original British show.
actually its originally from the yanks, YOU FOOL

Um the original show is the American one! Donald Trump started the Apprentice. Maybe you are thinking of Dragon's Den. The British and Australian Apprentice series came years after the American one which is the original.
